info.name: Validate Relationship Service Sandbox
info.description:
Example usage of the Validate Relationship Service (VRS) sandbox.

Full specification is available at [https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/validated-relationship-service)

request.description: Returns information about the relationship between the two specified NHS numbers.
Returns information about the relationship between the two specified NHS numbers as well as the related patient record.
